titles.title: Office of National Drug Control Policy Political Activities Act of 1993
A bill to prohibit certain political activities of certain Federal officers in the office of National Drug Control Policy.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5034-5035)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/28/1993--Introduced. Office of National Drug Control Policy Political Activities Act of 1993 - Amends the Anti-Drug Abuse Act of 1988 to prohibit the Director, the Deputy Director for Demand Reduction, the Deputy Director for Supply Reduction, and the Associate Director for National Drug Control Policy from taking an active part in political management or political campaigns.
